attributes.name: card

attributes.description: Set the amount of time, in milliseconds, to wait to trigger the `balChange` event after each keystroke. This also impacts form bindings such as `ngModel` or `v-model`.

attributes.description: Size of the button

attributes.name: animated
attributes.description: Disables all animation inside the bal-app. Can be used for simplify e2e testing.

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: Define the color for the badge.

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: Name of the icon to show. If a icon is present text should be hidden.

attributes.name: position
attributes.description: If `true` the badge is added to the top right corner of the card.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Define the size of badge. Small is recommended for tabs.

attributes.name: bottom-rounded
attributes.description: If `true` the bottom corners get rounded

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: The color to use from your application's color palette.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: If `true`, the user cannot interact with the button.

attributes.name: download
attributes.description:
This attribute instructs browsers to download a URL instead of navigating to
it, so the user will be prompted to save it as a local file. If the attribute
has a value, it is used as the pre-filled file name in the Save prompt
(the user can still change the file name if they want).

attributes.name: element-type
attributes.description: The type of button.

attributes.name: expanded
attributes.description: If `true` the button has a full width

attributes.name: flat
attributes.description: If `true` the button has no padding and a reduced height

attributes.name: href
attributes.description: Specifies the URL of the page the link goes to

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: Name of the left button icon

attributes.name: icon-right
attributes.description: Name of the right button icon

attributes.name: icon-turn
attributes.description: If `true` the icon turns

attributes.name: inverted
attributes.description: If `true` the button is inverted

attributes.name: is-active
attributes.description: If `true` the button has a active theme

attributes.name: loading
attributes.description: If `true` the label is hidden and a loading spinner is shown instead.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the button, which is submitted with the form data.

attributes.name: no-wrap
attributes.description: The label of the button will not break

attributes.name: outlined
attributes.description: If `true` the button is outlined

attributes.name: rel
attributes.description:
Specifies the relationship of the target object to the link object.
The value is a space-separated list of [link types](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Link_types).

attributes.name: rounded
attributes.description: If `true` the button is rounded.

attributes.name: shadow
attributes.description: If `true` adds a box shadow to improve readability on image background

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Size of the button

attributes.name: square
attributes.description: If `true` the width of the buttons is limited

attributes.name: target
attributes.description:
Specifies where to display the linked URL.
Only applies when an `href` is provided.

attributes.name: top-rounded
attributes.description: If `true` the top corners get rounded

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The value of the button, which is submitted with the form data.

attributes.name: direction
attributes.description:
`auto` will position the button items vertical and full width.
`row` will force that the buttons are also horizontal on mobile.

attributes.name: position
attributes.description: The value of the button, which is submitted with the form data.

attributes.name: reverse
attributes.description: If `true` the flex direction is used in reverse on mobile.

attributes.name: border
attributes.description: If `true` a light blue border is added to the card.

attributes.name: clickable
attributes.description: If `true` the card has a hover effect.

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: Defines the color of the card.

attributes.name: flat
attributes.description: If `true` the card loses its shadow.

attributes.name: fullheight
attributes.description: If `true` the card uses 100% of the available height.

attributes.name: inverted
attributes.description: If `true` the card background color becomes blue.

attributes.name: selected
attributes.description: If `true` the card gets a light background to indicate a selection.

attributes.name: space
attributes.description: Defines the space of the card content.

attributes.name: square
attributes.description: If `true` the card loses its border radius.

attributes.description: If `true`, the user cannot interact with the button.

attributes.name: border

attributes.description: If `true` items move under the controls, instead of having a gap

attributes.name: controls-sticky

attributes.name: interface
attributes.description: Defines special looks.

attributes.name: inverted
attributes.description: If `true` the carousel can be used on dark background

attributes.name: items-per-view
attributes.description:
Defines how many slides are visible in the container for the user.
`auto` will use the size of the actual item content

attributes.name: scroll-y
attributes.description: If `true` vertical scrolling on mobile is enabled.

attributes.name: steps
attributes.description: When how many slides are moved when going forward or backward.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Defines the active slide index.

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: Color of the background

attributes.name: download

This attribute instructs browsers to download a URL instead of navigating to
it, so the user will be prompted to save it as a local file. If the attribute
has a value, it is used as the pre-filled file name in the Save prompt
(the user can still change the file name if they want).

A DOMString representing the value of the checkbox. This is not displayed on the

attributes.description: If `true` the data list is horizontal instead of vertical.

attributes.name: close-on-select
attributes.description: Closes the datepicker popover after selection

attributes.name: debounce
attributes.description: Set the amount of time, in milliseconds, to wait to trigger the `ionChange` event after each keystroke. This also impacts form bindings such as `ngModel` or `v-model`.

attributes.name: default-date
attributes.description: The date to defines where the datepicker popup starts. The prop accepts ISO 8601 date strings (YYYY-MM-DD).

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: If `true`, the element is not mutable, focusable, or even submitted with the form. The user can neither edit nor focus on the control, nor its form control descendants.

attributes.name: invalid
attributes.description: If `true` the component gets a invalid style.

attributes.name: loading
attributes.description: Defines if the select is in a loading state.

attributes.name: max
attributes.description:
The maximum datetime allowed. Value must be a date string
following the
[ISO 8601 datetime format standard](https://www.w3.org/TR/NOTE-datetime),
`1996-12-19`. The format does not have to be specific to an exact
datetime. For example, the maximum could just be the year, such as `1994`.
Defaults to the end of this year.

attributes.name: max-year
attributes.description: Latest year available for selection

attributes.name: min
attributes.description:
The minimum datetime allowed. Value must be a date string
following the
[ISO 8601 datetime format standard](https://www.w3.org/TR/NOTE-datetime),
such as `1996-12-19`. The format does not have to be specific to an exact
datetime. For example, the minimum could just be the year, such as `1994`.
Defaults to the beginning of the year, 100 years ago from today.

attributes.name: min-year
attributes.description: Earliest year available for selection

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the control, which is submitted with the form data.

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: The text to display when the select is empty.

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.description: If `true` the element can not mutated, meaning the user can not edit the control.

attributes.name: required
attributes.description: If `true` the attribute required is added to the native input.

attributes.name: trigger-icon
attributes.description: If `true` the datepicker only open on click of the icon

attributes.description: The value of the form field, which accepts ISO 8601 date strings (YYYY-MM-DD).

attributes.description:
When true, the text will be truncated with a text overflow ellipsis instead of wrapping.
Please note that text overflow can only occur in block or inline-block level elements,
as these elements require a width to overflow.

attributes.description: If `true` adds a text shadow to improve readability on image background

attributes.description: If `true` the heading gets displayed slimmer.

attributes.description:
Make the visual style mimic a specific heading level.
This option allows you to make e.g. h1 visually look like h3,
but still keep it h1 in the markup.

attributes.name: svg
attributes.description: Svg content.

attributes.name: turn
attributes.description: If `true` the icon is rotated 180deg

attributes.name: accept
attributes.description: If the value of the type attribute is `"file"`, then this attribute will indicate the types of files that the server accepts, otherwise it will be ignored. The value must be a comma-separated list of unique content type specifiers.

attributes.name: allowed-key-press
attributes.description: A regular expression that the key of the key press event is checked against and if not matching the expression the event will be prevented.

attributes.name: autocapitalize
attributes.description:
Indicates whether and how the text value should be automatically capitalized as it is entered/edited by the user.
Available options: `"off"`, `"none"`, `"on"`, `"sentences"`, `"words"`, `"characters"`.

attributes.name: autocomplete
attributes.description: Indicates whether the value of the control can be automatically completed by the browser.

attributes.name: autocorrect
attributes.description: Whether auto correction should be enabled when the user is entering/editing the text value.

attributes.name: autofocus
attributes.description: This Boolean attribute lets you specify that a form control should have input focus when the page loads.

attributes.name: clickable
attributes.description: If `true` the input gets a clickable cursor style

attributes.name: debounce
attributes.description: Set the amount of time, in milliseconds, to wait to trigger the `balChange` event after each keystroke. This also impacts form bindings such as `ngModel` or `v-model`.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: If `true`, the element is not mutable, focusable, or even submitted with the form. The user can neither edit nor focus on the control, nor its form control descendants.

attributes.name: inputmode
attributes.description:
A hint to the browser for which keyboard to display.
Possible values: `"none"`, `"text"`, `"tel"`, `"url"`,
`"email"`, `"numeric"`, `"decimal"`, and `"search"`.

attributes.name: invalid
attributes.description: If `true` the component gets a invalid style.

attributes.name: mask
attributes.description:
Mask of the input field. It defines what the user can enter and how the format looks like. Currently, only for Switzerland formatted with addition of Belgian enterprisenumber and IBAN.
Formatting for 'contract-number': '99/1.234.567-1'
Formatting for 'claim-number': ('73/001217/16.9')
Formatting for 'offer-number': ('98/7.654.321')
Formatting for 'be-enterprise-number': ('1234.567.890')
Formatting for 'be-iban': ('BE68 5390 0754 7034')

attributes.name: max
attributes.description: The maximum value, which must not be less than its minimum (min attribute) value.

attributes.name: max-length
attributes.description: Defines the max length of the value.

attributes.name: min
attributes.description: The minimum value, which must not be greater than its maximum (max attribute) value.

attributes.name: min-length
attributes.description: Defines the min length of the value.

attributes.name: multiple
attributes.description: If `true`, the user can enter more than one value. This attribute applies when the type attribute is set to `"email"` or `"file"`, otherwise it is ignored.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the control, which is submitted with the form data.

attributes.name: pattern
attributes.description: A regular expression that the value is checked against. The pattern must match the entire value, not just some subset. Use the title attribute to describe the pattern to help the user. This attribute applies when the value of the type attribute is `"text"`, `"search"`, `"tel"`, `"url"`, `"email"`, `"date"`, or `"password"`, otherwise it is ignored. When the type attribute is `"date"`, `pattern` will only be used in browsers that do not support the `"date"` input type natively. See https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/input/date for more information.

attributes.description: Instructional text that shows before the input has a value.

attributes.description: If `true`, the user must fill in a value before submitting a form.

attributes.description: The name of the control, which is submitted with the form data.

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.description: If `true` the element can not mutated, meaning the user can not edit the control.

attributes.name: steps
attributes.description: The steps in which the input increases or decreases

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The value of the input. Only allows values in the range of the min max attribute.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: If `true`, the element is not mutable, focusable, or even submitted with the form. The user can neither edit nor focus on the control, nor its form control descendants.

attributes.name: html-for
attributes.description:
The value of the for attribute must be a single id for a labeled
form-related element in the same document as the <label> element.
So, any given label element can be associated with only one form control.

attributes.name: invalid
attributes.description: If `true` the component gets a invalid red style.

attributes.name: multiline
attributes.description: When true, the text will is able to break on multiple lines.

attributes.name: no-wrap
attributes.description:
When true, the text will be truncated with a text overflow ellipsis instead of wrapping.
Please note that text overflow can only occur in block or inline-block level elements,
as these elements require a width to overflow.

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.description: If `true` the element can not mutated, meaning the user can not edit the control.

attributes.name: required
attributes.description:
If `true` the form control needs to be filled. If it is set to
`false` an optional label is added to the label..

attributes.name: size
attributes.description:
Defines the size of the font. Default is like a heading 5 and small is used
with the form fields.

attributes.name: valid
attributes.description: If `true` the component gets a valid green style.

attributes.name: accordion-one-level
attributes.description: If `true` only one of the layers can be open and the others close automatically

attributes.name: background
attributes.description: If `true` the list can be used on a light, dark or colored backgrounds

attributes.name: border
attributes.description: If `true` each list item has a bottom border

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: If `true` the list item can not be hovered

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Defines the min height of the list item

attributes.name: accordion
attributes.description: If `true` the list item can be used as a accordion

attributes.name: clickable
attributes.description: If `true` the list item shows that it is clickable

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: If `true` the list item can be hovered

attributes.name: download
attributes.description:
This attribute instructs browsers to download a URL instead of navigating to
it, so the user will be prompted to save it as a local file. If the attribute
has a value, it is used as the pre-filled file name in the Save prompt
(the user can still change the file name if they want).

attributes.name: href
attributes.description: Specifies the URL of the page the link goes to

attributes.name: selected
attributes.description: If `true` the list item has a selected theme

attributes.name: sub-accordion-item
attributes.description: If `true` the list item can be used as an accordion inside another accordion

attributes.name: target
attributes.description: Specifies where to open the linked document

attributes.name: accordion-group
attributes.description:
Synchronizes the height of the accordion to max of all
the other grouped accordion bodies

attributes.name: content-alignment
attributes.description: Sets justify-content of the items to start, center, end, or space-between. Default is start

attributes.name: content-space
attributes.description: Sets space to content of the accordion body

attributes.name: accordion-open
attributes.description: If `true` the list accordion is open

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: Icon name string with value 'plus' on default

attributes.name: right
attributes.description: If `true` the icon is on the right side of the list item. Default is the left side.

attributes.name: level
attributes.description: Heading level with value 'h4' on default

attributes.name: visual-level
attributes.description:
Make the visual style mimic a specific heading level.
This option allows you to make e.g. h1 visually look like h3,
but still keep it h1 in the markup.

attributes.name: animated
attributes.description: Defines if the animation should be active

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: Defines the color of the logo.

attributes.name: backdrop-dismiss
attributes.description: If `true`, the modal can be closed with the click outside of the modal

attributes.name: component
attributes.description: The component to display inside of the modal.

attributes.name: css-class
attributes.description:
Additional classes to apply for custom CSS. If multiple classes are
provided they should be separated by spaces.

attributes.name: has-backdrop
attributes.description: If `true`, a backdrop will be displayed behind the modal.

attributes.name: is-closable
attributes.description: If `true`, the modal can be closed with the escape key or the little close button.

attributes.name: modal-width
attributes.description: Defines the width of the modal body

attributes.name: space
attributes.description: Defines the space/padding of the modal

attributes.name: clickable
attributes.description: If `true` the link can be clickable

attributes.name: href
attributes.description: Specifies the URL of the page the link goes to

attributes.name: selected
attributes.description: If `true` the link gets selected with a underline

attributes.name: target
attributes.description:
Specifies where to display the linked URL.
Only applies when an `href` is provided.

attributes.name: variant
attributes.description: Defines the variant of the link

attributes.name: static-col
attributes.description: Defines the static column which is always aligned to the right

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: Defines the color of the group

attributes.name: invisible
attributes.description: Tells when to hide the bar

attributes.name: position
attributes.description: Defines the position of the bar

attributes.name: invisible
attributes.description: Tells when to hide the bar

attributes.name: position
attributes.description: Defines the position of the bar

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Defines the height of the bar

attributes.name: variant
attributes.description: Defines the color variant

attributes.name: container
attributes.description: Sets the content content width with the regular container classes

attributes.name: interface
attributes.description:
Defines the type of navbar. App is used for almost every web applications
like the portal app. For our sales funnel we recommend to use the simple navbar.
Meta and main are used for the website.

attributes.name: light
attributes.description: It `true` the navbar has a white background. Always use the blue header.

attributes.name: animated
attributes.description: Defines if the logo animation should be active

attributes.name: href
attributes.description: Link of the logo / title.

attributes.name: logo
attributes.description: Src to display a logo -> replaces the default Baloise Logo

attributes.name: target
attributes.description:
Specifies where to display the linked URL.
Only applies when an `href` is provided.

attributes.name: aria-label-main
attributes.description: Aria label for the main-navigation-wrapper

attributes.name: aria-label-meta
attributes.description: Aria label for the meta-navigation-wrapper

attributes.name: logo-animated
attributes.description: Defines if the animation should be active

attributes.name: logo-path
attributes.description: Path to the logo-image

attributes.name: meta-value
attributes.description: Defines the initially active meta-navigation-item

attributes.name: is-tab-link
attributes.description: It is 'true' when the meta item is used as a link and not as a tab

attributes.name: is-tab-link
attributes.description: It is 'true' when the meta item is used as a link and not as a tab

attributes.name: link
attributes.description: sub link of the meta tab, rendered on touch resolution

attributes.name: aria-label-main
attributes.description: aria label for main navigation bar

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: Color of the menu list card background

attributes.name: headline
attributes.description: Optional headline of the menu list card

attributes.name: href
attributes.description: Optional href of the menu list card headline as link

attributes.name: target
attributes.description: Target of the menu list card headline target as link

attributes.name: aria-label-meta
attributes.description: aria label for meta navigation bar

attributes.name: active-color
attributes.description: Color style of the button when the popover is open.

attributes.name: arrow
attributes.description: If `true` a little arrow is added, which points to the trigger element

attributes.name: backdrop
attributes.description: If `true` a backdrop is added

attributes.name: closable
attributes.description: If 'false', the closing button is not displayed

attributes.name: content-expanded
attributes.description: If `true` the content has a min width of 100%.

attributes.name: content-min-width
attributes.description: Define the min width of the popover content.

attributes.name: content-no-shadow
attributes.description: If `true` the popover does not have the shadow

attributes.name: content-radius
attributes.description: Defines border-radius of popover content.

attributes.name: content-width
attributes.description: Define the max width of the popover content.

attributes.name: heading
attributes.description: Defines the heading of the popover

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: Defines the icon of the trigger button.

attributes.name: inactive-color
attributes.description: Color style of the button when the popover is closed.

attributes.name: inverted
attributes.description: Turns the trigger button to inverted style.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Defines the label of the button

attributes.name: mobile-top
attributes.description: If `true` its content will have a divider line on top

attributes.name: offset-y
attributes.description: Define the offset of the popover content.

attributes.name: position
attributes.description: Define the position of the popover content.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Defines the size of the button

attributes.name: square
attributes.description: If `true` the width of the buttons is limited

attributes.name: color
attributes.description:
Defines the color of the element
Color type primary is deprecated, please use info instead.

attributes.name: debounce
attributes.description: Set the amount of time, in milliseconds, to wait to trigger the `balChange` event after each keystroke. This also impacts form bindings such as `ngModel` or `v-model`.

attributes.name: decimal
attributes.description: Defines the allowed decimal points for the `number-input`.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: If `true`, the element is not mutable, focusable, or even submitted with the form. The user can neither edit nor focus on the control, nor its form control descendants.

attributes.name: exact-number
attributes.description: If `true` the input value has 0 as default value

attributes.name: invalid
attributes.description: If `true` the component gets a invalid style.

attributes.name: max
attributes.description: The maximum value, which must not be less than its minimum (min attribute) value.

attributes.name: min
attributes.description: The minimum value, which must not be greater than its maximum (max attribute) value.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the control, which is submitted with the form data.

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: Instructional text that shows before the input has a value.

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.description: If `true` the element can not mutated, meaning the user can not edit the control.

attributes.name: required
attributes.description: If `true`, the user must fill in a value before submitting a form.

attributes.name: suffix
attributes.description: Adds a suffix the the input-value after blur.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The value of the input.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disables component

attributes.name: interface
attributes.description: Defines the layout of the pagination

attributes.name: page-range
attributes.description: Specify the max visible pages before and after the selected page

attributes.name: sticky
attributes.description: If 'true, the pagination will be sticky to the top

attributes.name: top
attributes.description: If sticky, the top position will be determined by this value

attributes.name: total-pages
attributes.description: The total amount of pages

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Current selected page

attributes.name: arrow
attributes.description: If `true` a little arrow is added, which points to the trigger element

attributes.name: auto-trigger

attributes.name: backdrop
attributes.description: If `true` a backdrop is added

attributes.description: If `true` the popover has max-width on tablet and desktop. On mobile it uses the whole viewport.

attributes.description: Define the min width of the popover content.

attributes.description: If `true` the content will have a divider line on top

attributes.description: Limit the height of the popover content. Pass the amount of pixel.

attributes.name: spaceless
attributes.description: If `true` the popover has no padding space.

attributes.description: The visible width of the text control, in average character widths. If it is specified, it must be a positive integer.

attributes.name: debounce
attributes.description: Set the amount of time, in milliseconds, to wait to trigger the `ionChange` event after each keystroke. This also impacts form bindings such as `ngModel` or `v-model`.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: If `true`, the element is not mutable, focusable, or even submitted with the form. The user can neither edit nor focus on the control, nor its form control descendants.

attributes.name: inputmode
attributes.description:
A hint to the browser for which keyboard to display.
Possible values: `"none"`, `"text"`, `"tel"`, `"url"`,
`"email"`, `"numeric"`, `"decimal"`, and `"search"`.

attributes.name: invalid
attributes.description: If `true` the component gets a invalid style.

attributes.name: max-length
attributes.description: If the value of the type attribute is `text`, `email`, `search`, `password`, `tel`, or `url`, this attribute specifies the maximum number of characters that the user can enter.

attributes.name: min-length
attributes.description: If the value of the type attribute is `text`, `email`, `search`, `password`, `tel`, or `url`, this attribute specifies the minimum number of characters that the user can enter.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the control, which is submitted with the form data.

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: Instructional text that shows before the input has a value.

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.description: If `true` the element can not mutated, meaning the user can not edit the control.

attributes.name: required
attributes.description: If `true`, the user must fill in a value before submitting a form.

attributes.name: rows
attributes.description: The number of visible text lines for the control.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The value of the textarea.

attributes.name: wrap
attributes.description: Indicates how the control wraps text.

attributes.name: debounce
attributes.description: Set the amount of time, in milliseconds, to wait to trigger the `balChange` event after each keystroke. This also impacts form bindings such as `ngModel` or `v-model`.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: If `true`, the element is not mutable, focusable, or even submitted with the form. The user can neither edit nor focus on the control, nor its form control descendants.

attributes.name: invalid
attributes.description: If `true` the component gets a invalid style.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the control, which is submitted with the form data.

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.description: If `true` the element can not mutated, meaning the user can not edit the control.

attributes.name: required
attributes.description: If `true`, the user must fill in a value before submitting a form.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The value of the input.

attributes.name: color
attributes.description:
The theme type of the toast.
Color type primary is deprecated, please use info instead.

attributes.name: duration
attributes.description: The duration of the toast in milliseconds.

attributes.name: message
attributes.description: Content message
